scripts.build-src: cd src && npm install && npm run build
scripts.bmx:cntest: cd src/create-entry && npm run prebuild && npm run build && npm run package && NODE_ENV=cntest cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.bmx:cnprod: cd src/create-entry && npm run prebuild && npm run build && npm run package && NODE_ENV=cnprod cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:cntest: cd src/create-entry && npm run prebuild && npm run build && npm run package && NODE_ENV=cntest cdk deploy  --profile CommerceGCTest
scripts.deploy:cnprod: cd src/create-entry && npm run prebuild && npm run build && npm run package && NODE_ENV=cnprod cdk deploy  --profile CommerceGCProd
